page.title: 16MY FAVOURITE DAY
page.content: My favourite day is SATURDAY because the next day isn't school and I can go shopping. I like Saturdays because I can play outside,go for walks,ride my bike,play at my friend's house,watch TV and have lots of sweets.Sometimes I play cricket with my friends.I like helping my Dad in the garden.I also help my Mum do the washing up. (Adam.Age 9) My favourite day is TUESDAY because we go Swimming.I like swimming,it is good.There is a boy who helps us.His name is Christopher Aldridge.He is a good helper for his age, because he is 14. I like picking up weights and swimming a length.When we get back to School,we have Break and then'Time & Tune.'We get our bags,say"Bye"to our teacher and go home on the Army Bus. (Judy.Age 8)
